items.title: Upload product via WhatsApp
items.content: To upload a product, choose Upload product, enter the name and price, then select the unit and currency, and send a product photo. Description and category are optional.

items.title: Post an upcoming harvest
items.content: Choose Post harvest, provide crop, harvest window (e.g., Apr 10â€“20), quantity and unit (lb/kg), and optional notes.

items.title: Respond to buyer requests
items.content: Choose Requests & quotes, pick a request, then provide unit price, currency, available quantity, optional delivery date and notes.
